text: Robert III of Scotland was king of Scotland from 1390 to 1406 Robert III may also refer to: * Robert III, Count of Worms (800–834) * Robert III, Prince of Capua (1153–1158) * Robert III, Count of Loritello (died 1182) * Robert III de Brus (fl. 12th century, died ca. 1191) * Robert III, Count of Dreux (1185–1234) * Robert III, Count of Flanders (1249 – September 17, 1322) * Robert III of Artois (1287–1342) * Robert III de La Marck (1491–1537)
title: Robert III
